snippet.title: Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival - Trailer
snippet.description:
Get into the driver’s seat and put the pedal to the metal! The next part in the legendary Zombie Derby series is already here!

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/zombie-derby-pixel-survival/9PF3B188B28R
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1271690/Zombie_Derby_Pixel_Survival/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013631
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/zombie-derby-pixel-survival-switch/
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nf0mzlh95zb
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.herocraft.game.zombiederby.pixel.survival
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1512171366
More: https://zombiederby.com/pixel_survival/

Smash your way through hordes of zombies and countless obstacles in a rip-roaring racing arcade.

Experience the zombie apocalypse like you’ve never seen it before. Eradicating zombies has never been so colorful, exciting, and engaging before.
